original_title: The Maggie dela Riva Story (God... Why Me?)
overview: The 1967 story of young rising actress Maggie De La Riva's abduction and rape, and the trial against her 4 abductors.
tagline: The loudest cry of rape transformed a woman's tradegy into a victim's victory!
title: The Maggie dela Riva Story (God... Why Me?)
